pr_title: STtorage key list formatting and Artifactory storage API

timeline.bodyText: @g4s8 hm, I do no think this class should be introduced in artipie/artipie, it seems more like part of SliceList we never implemented in http (but we have issue artipie/http#158 for that): this SliceList could except storage, base key and interface to format each key. What do you think?
timeline.author: olenagerasimova
timeline.diffHunk:

+public final class KeyList {

replies.bodyText: @olenagerasimova yes, it's a good point. I think it can be moved to http as a part of implementation of artipie/http#158 ticket
replies.author: g4s8
